attributes.action: Stop the cutting of Ellis School, Hemingfield School Crossing Patrol
attributes.additional_details: Due to retirement, Barnsley Council have decided to axe the School Crossing Patrol at Ellis School, Hemingfield, Barnsley, S73. This saves approx £2,500 per year in wages,which we feel is a small amount for the safety of our children. We have our local MP on side but need as many signatures as we can to keep fighting the decision.
